verbs.description: [ARG0: Tech heavyweights from Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook to Facebook Inc. boss Mark Zuckerberg] [V: joined] [ARG1: a chorus of Americans denouncing the Trump administration ’s policy of separating undocumented children from their families at the border] . But it ’s unclear whether the industry has any real leverage to stop the practice .
